prod_short_desc: Display THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE minifigures!
prod_long_desc:
Show off up to 20 THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE minifigures in this stylish black and yellow collector frame. Hang the frame on the wall, stand it on a table, shelf or mantelpiece, or lay it down flat—the choice is yours. Makes a great gift for fans of THE LEGO BATMAN MOVIE.
Features a black and yellow frame with a LEGO® logo and Bat-shaped symbol, black LEGO backdrop and 20 LEGO elements for attaching and displaying minifigures.
Hang or stand the frame or lay it down flat.
Minifigures are not included.
Measures over 11” square and 1” long.
set: THE LEGO® BATMAN MOVIE Batman™ Minifigure Collector Frame
